Title: Enacts the regional equity in policy implementation act
Summary: Enacts the regional equity in policy implementation act; establishes a regional impact assessment framework; requires a ten-point regional impact test for statewide climate, energy, and infrastructure policies.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a regional impact assessment framework and requiring a ten-point regional impact test for statewide climate, energy, and infrastructure policies
